Series Code: Rural poverty gap at national poverty lines (%) (SI.POV.RUGP)
Description: Source : National Source (http://dds.bps.go.id/eng/); Based on SUSENAS using GSO expenditure poverty line  The welfare measure used is  consumption per capita.
